website_summaries.verdict: Two sizes of microfiber cloths and a cleaning pen with carbon-based cleaning element are highlights of this very complete kit.
pros: Two sizes of cloths are useful for multiple lenses
Kit comes with swabs for sensor cleaning
Includes air blower for tough to reach spots and dust particle brush
The hard bristle cleaning pen includes a non-liquid cleaning element
The alcohol-free sensor cleaning solution comes in convenient spray bottle
Carrying case is included to keep everything organized
cons: Sensor cleaning solution isn't water-based, so might not be best option for users who prefer chemical-free solution

customer_reviews.title: Have no fear, get this, sensor etc is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Liked: -loupe has 7x magnification, helped me see where the debris was... So helpful! -swabs and microfiber cloth come in sealed packages, and very clean. -there are good instructions on how to clean -cleaning fluid worked well, evaporated off leaving clean surface -case to put it all in is sturdy, ready for next time I need to clean -Rocket air bulb looks like a rocket, high quality, with the right amount of air burst. Disliked: -loupe's (2) cr2032 batteries were dead. (With new batteries, loupe worked great.) -had to clean the lens of the loupe with the kit before I could clean anything else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dougal

customer_reviews.title: My photos are spotless
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean the sensor seal on my Nikon D300. I change lenses frequently which allows dust in and a few years back, fell in a river with my camera. All my pictures had little dark spots. The spots were in the same position on each picture. The Movo kit allows me to clean the sensor seal with the swabs. The magnifier loupe helps me to see if the sensor is clean. I can then use the brushes to remove dust or stains left and repeat the process until the loupe shows me the sensor is clean.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF WATSON / WATSON GRAPHICS, INC.

customer_reviews.title: Just the Perfect Camera Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I most appreciate the instructions that came with the kit - including, when NOT to clean my camera! That was refreshingly honest, not the usual "use our product obsessively" approach. Secondly, the kit itself is well-constructed, well-organized, and makes it easy to select and properly use which tool is needed for the steps outlined in the cleaning process. Thirdly, the price is right. I am by no means a professional photographer and to be honest don't have much desire to become one, but I am thoroughly enjoying my Canon EOS Rebel T6/1300D dSLR and want to make sure I give it the care it deserves. Your cleaning kit will enable me to do just that. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JenInJapan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having problems with spots or dust showing up on my photos (Canon DSLR) and become very tired of having to use the Stamp Tool to remove them. I've shied away from attempting to do more than wife off lenses in the past because of fear of damaging the sensor. However, after a bit of reading, I purchased the Movo Deluxe...kit, and in 30 minutes had watched a good, brief Canon video walking me through the cleaning process and completed the process and tested it. I am delighted and plan to use the kit on another Canon camera. This is very easy and I'm sure I'll improve as I go forward. But for now, this is a homerun!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Patrick Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaning kit with a nice case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little kit for camera cleaning including the sensor. The case is very nice. I cleaned my sensor with it and now it's good as new. The cleaning cloths are very nice. The only thing was the battery in the loupe was dead, but since I was surprised there was even a battery in it, I can't complain too much. The loupe, brushes and other goodies are all of good quality and it's nice to have a decent case to put it all in. Best of all, no more spots on my sensor!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Photography is a creative outlet that allows me to unwind from this world of crazy. I am an amateur with Canon EOS Rebel T6. Even still, for me it was alot of $ and, when 2 dark spots appeared on my photos, I decided to make this purchase. Very happy I did! Pics attached (taken with phone) are in order from very first opening upon delivery of product 4.19.19. After watching several instructional videos on YouTube, I was successful in cleaning and spots are completely gone. The loupe included is a must have and makes it well worth the small amount of extra $ for this kit. The hard case is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: RK Columbia, SC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bundle for the price and highly effective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit specifically to clean the sensor of my Leica M8. The contents of this kit are of very good quality, and everything comes in its own sterile packaging. The sensor swabs were smaller than my CCD sensor but they did the trick when the blower bulb did not get all the dust out. Comparably to the other kits I found on Amazon this is the best bang for your buck. I am posting some before and after photos to emphasize the effect the use of this kit had.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: All you need to clean your camera sensor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Could use some full sensor swabs to make it complete. Very nice case to hold everything. Batteries for the LED loupe were DOA. Looks like the on off switch can come on during shipping, as the switch was on. Buy this kit for the great price. This is the most complete senor cleaning kit I can find.
customer_reviews.author: John Hafer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. The illuminated magnifier is FAN-TAS-TIC. Don't know how I got along without it. The air blaster really packs a punch. A comprehensive kit in a nice travel case and a very attractive price.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get a clean sensor.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! It has saved me hundreds of dollars. Since don’t have to take my camera to a camera shop to have the sensor cleaned, this easily paid for itself in one use. Every tool you need to get a safely clean semsor is here. You can use it to clean your lenses as well.
customer_reviews.author: HarvyDanger Films

customer_reviews.title: Good selection of products for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of necessary and useful camera body and lens cleaning products. The case is too big to carry on long trips. But all of the products fit in my camera backpack.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is good. The loop works great for cleaning your camera a must. The case is sturdy and fits everything in it. The brushes have hairs that come loose so you have to be careful of that. Everything else worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. The case is very nicely done to keep it organized, clean, and safe with my gear. The loupe seems well built and woks great with a decent supply of cleaning tips, solution, and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Johnston

customer_reviews.title: does it all
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to photography, but it seems to have everything that I need to keep my sensor, mirror, and lens clean.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R Mavroudis

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything necessary for cleaning lenses and sensor. Good value and fast shipping. Nice case, too.
customer_reviews.author: bruceian

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera lens care kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for any Camera equipment and comes in beautiful hard shell case as well
customer_reviews.author: J.C.V.

customer_reviews.title: Very complete kit
customer_reviews.text: Had everything I needed and even a little extra space in the case for some stuff I had leftover from another kit.... I really like the rocket shaped bellows.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bad Product At All
customer_reviews.text: Needs lens cleaner but otherwise very comprehensive. The little magnifier is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: The LED lope light isn't bright enough to shine on the camera sensor, some of the brush's bristles fell out during first use, the blower worked fine, and the case was a plus. Make sure you now what size swabs you need for the sensor. I needed full frame - my bad for not researching before I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hale

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great overall package with everything you need. The loupe is a definite necessity for cleaning a camera sensor and did I it using one wand. I just saved $150 having my local camera shop do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use brush on lens
customer_reviews.text: The brush leaves an oily residue on your lens. Don’t use the brush on the lens. Everything else is great. I love the case too.
customer_reviews.author: John Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two kits. Both arrived with dead batteries in the loupe. Other than that it came with the expected contents. After I buy some batteries I'll be able to see if I need to further clean my sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Steelyeyes

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! It cleaned my sensor and now my pictures are just as clear as when I first bought my camera
customer_reviews.author: KenosAngel

customer_reviews.title: This kit is excellent for Lens and sensor cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This kit is excellent for Lens and sensor cleaning. The lighted magnifier is especially helpful. The case is sturdy and great for keeping all you need for lens/sensor cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buford

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great at lightning up sensor to view dust, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: EJ Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need, including a case.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my inspire 2 camera. Has everything you need
customer_reviews.author: JOHN H. WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Led magnifier works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great kit to clean your sensor. You can really see it with the led lighted magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa F

customer_reviews.title: Was surprised by the amount of stuff in the case.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product and pleasantly surprised by the amount of stuff in the kit. Very nice and professional looking carry case as well.
customer_reviews.author: rgm

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Movo... Everything I would require to ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Movo... Everything I would require to maintain my camera in proper working order.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for Full-frame cameras!
customer_reviews.text: The swabs are not for full frame cameras, as their title says. Amazon may suggest it to you anyway! The quality of material is good, but the value for the money is not there!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: What you need....its all here.
customer_reviews.text: if there is one kit you must have for the Sony a7ii its this kit...being able to see whats on your sensor is golden rather than sweeping it blindly.....
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: The included loupe makes this kit a worthwhile purchase in ...
customer_reviews.text: The included loupe makes this kit a worthwhile purchase in and of itself. If you don't get this one, make sure you get one with a loupe.
customer_reviews.author: thechihawk

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaning kit yet ! The lens cleaning pen with the triangle tip (not just a round tip) that made the entire purchase worthwhile. Great kit, will purchase when needed again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Camera cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: In this kit was a Magnified to look at the sensor and battery is dead every time I get something through amazon something wrong !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin b cowan

customer_reviews.title: A mst have for outdoor photography
customer_reviews.text: I had dust on my sensor from a previous trip. This kit gently cleaned it and the LED loupe is a must have and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: moving through life

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I sabe a gd money using those tools. Very easy to use. It work great

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, I can take it with me on shoots! It's perfect! Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Dead Batteries
customer_reviews.text: The led Loupe did not come with the battery drain protection plastic inserts, batteries completely dead. Good thing I had some 2032 batteries on hand... Everything else seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Everything feels grate the only issue was that some black stuff came off the cleaning pen when i used it. It was easy to clean of with a tissue.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: lit magnifyer
customer_reviews.text: so glad that i bought the kit with the lit magnifyer - great product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent . . .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit with everything needed in a handy, convenient carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So many items in one package, worth the money. I'd highly recommend this very quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want and more
customer_reviews.text: Great kit and amazing customer service. I will buy from these folks again.

customer_reviews.title: Great clean sensor kit
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I used clean sensor for Fujiflim X-T2 easy to use great quality

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit. The only thing is the light ring did not work. I contacted the company, but have not gotten a response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Snowsleder

customer_reviews.title: Camera cleaning essentials in a nice case
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly! Absolutely perfect for my needs. Loved that I could view and clean the sensor on my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Stevens

product_meta.title: Movo Deluxe Essentials DSLR Camera Cleaning Kit PRO with LED Loupe, 10 APS-C Swabs, Sensor Cleaning Fluid, Air Blower, Lens Pen, Soft Brush, 2X Small and 2X Large Microfiber Cloth and Carrying Case
feature_bullets: EVERYTHING YOU NEED: Includes LED Sensor Loupe, Rocket Air Blower, Tin-Oxide Camera Sensor Cleaner Liquid, APS-C Sensor Cleaning Swab (x10), Lens Pen, Plush Cleaning Brush, 9 x 9" Microfiber Cleaning Cloth (x20), 6 x 6" Microfiber Cleaning Cloth (x2)
SAFE SENSOR CLEANING: Soft sensor brush and rocket air blasters removes dust and particles from the sensor, other electronic parts and hard to reach areas
CLEANING SWABS: Used in combination with the CLEANING FLUID to safely remove any dirt and debris from your APC-S camera sensor
LED SENSOR LOUPE: Features 6 Ultra-bright LED’s, Illuminates & magnifies microscopic particles on your cameras sensor; LENS PEN: Carbon-based formula effectively cleans lenses, LCD's and more
9" and 6" MICROFIBER CLOTHS: Super soft material useful for cleaning oil, fingerprints, smudges and dirt for camera lenses, microscopes, telescopes, glasses, and other precision optical lenses.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
